abstract: Fighter jets escort Air France flight to John F Kennedy Airport, first of some six intercontinental flights landing at either Kennedy or Newark Liberty International Airport, after chemical weapon and bomb threats.
lead_paragraph: Half a dozen arrivals into the region on Monday were cleared as safe after landing at Kennedy and Newark Liberty international airports.

headline.main: Jets Are Scrambled Over New York as Airports See a Flurry of Threats
headline.print_headline: Two Fighter Jets Escort Airliner Amid Threats to Several Flights

snippet: Half a dozen arrivals into the region on Monday were cleared as safe after landing at Kennedy and Newark Liberty international airports.
